TypeSignature.Value: public struct Vector<T> : IEquatable<System.Numerics.Vector<T>>, IFormattable where T : struct

.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Vector`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Numerics.Vector`1<!T>>, class System.IFormattable
Public Structure Vector(Of T) Implements IEquatable(Of Vector(Of T)), IFormattable
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic value class Vector : IEquatable<System::Numerics::Vector<T>>, IFormattable
type Vector<'T (requires 'T : struct)> = struct interface IFormattable

typeparam.name: T

span.span: The vector type.

typeparam.span: T可以是任何基元数值类型。

span.span: T can be any primitive numeric type.

summary.span: 表示指定数值类型（适用于并行算法的低级别优化）的单个向量。

span.span: Represents a single vector of a specified numeric type that is suitable for low-level optimization of parallel algorithms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个不可变的结构，它表示指定数值类型的单个向量。 is an immutable structure that represents a single vector of a specified numeric type. 实例的计数是固定的，但其上限是 CPU 寄存器相关的。The count of instances is fixed, but its upper limit is CPU-register dependent. 它旨在用作向量化大型算法的构建基块，因此不能直接用作任意长度向量或 tensor。It is intended to be used as a building block for vectorizing large algorithms, and therefore cannot be used directly as an arbitrary length vector or tensor. 结构为硬件加速提供支持。The structure provides support for hardware acceleration. 本文档中的术语 "基元数值数据类型" 指的是 CPU 直接支持的数值数据类型，并具有可用于处理这些数据类型的指令。The term 'primitive numeric data type' in this document refers to numeric data types that are directly supported by the CPU and have instructions that can manipulate those data types. 下表显示了哪些基元数值数据类型和操作组合使用内部指令来实现更快的执行：The following table shows which primitive numeric data type and operation combination uses intrinsic instructions for faster executions: | 基元类型Primitive type | `+` | `-` | `*` | `/` | | --- | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | |`sbyte` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | |`byte` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | |`short` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | |`ushort` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | | `int` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | | `uint` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | | `long` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | | `ulong` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是No | 是No | | `float` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes | | `double` | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes | 是Yes |

summary.span: 创建 的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of .

remarks.format: 类型 `T` 可以是以下任意数值类型：The type `T` can be any of the following numeric types: | C# 关键字C# keywords | 框架类型Framework Type | | ----------- | -------------------- | | `sbyte` | | | `byte` | | | `short` | | | `ushort` | | | `int` | | | `uint` | | | `long` | | | `ulong` | | | `float` | | | `double` | |
